verses.verse: What<WG5101> advantage<WG4053> then<WG3767> hath the Jew<WG2453>? or<WG2228> what<WG5101> profit<WG5622> is there of circumcision<WG4061>?
Much<WG4183> every<WG2596><WG3956> way<WG5158>: chiefly<WG4412>, because<WG3303><WG1063> that<WG3754> unto them were committed<WG4100> the oracles<WG3051> of God<WG2316>.
For<WG1063> what<WG5101> if<WG1487> some<WG5100> did not believe<WG569><WG3361>? shall<WG2673> their<WG846> unbelief<WG570> make<WG2673> the faith<WG4102> of God<WG2316> without effect<WG2673>?

God forbid<WG3361><WG1096>: yea<WG1161>, let<WG1096> God<WG2316> be<WG1096> true<WG227>, but<WG1161> every<WG3956> man<WG444> a liar<WG5583>; as<WG2531> it is written<WG1125>, That<WG3704> thou mightest<WG302> be justified<WG1344> in<WG1722> thy<WG4675> sayings<WG3056>, and<WG2532> mightest overcome<WG3528> when<WG1722> thou<WG4571> art judged<WG2919>.

But<WG1161> if<WG1487> our<WG2257> unrighteousness<WG93> commend<WG4921> the righteousness<WG1343> of God<WG2316>, what<WG5101> shall we say<WG2046><WG3361>? Is God<WG2316> unrighteous<WG94> who taketh<WG2018> vengeance<WG3709>? (I speak<WG3004> as<WG2596> a man<WG444>)
God forbid<WG3361><WG1096>: for then<WG1893> how<WG4459> shall<WG2919> God<WG2316> judge<WG2919> the world<WG2889>?

For<WG1063> if<WG1487> the truth<WG225> of God<WG2316> hath more abounded<WG4052> through<WG1722> my<WG1699> lie<WG5582> unto<WG1519> his<WG846> glory<WG1391>; why<WG5101> yet<WG2089> am<WG2919> I also<WG2504> judged<WG2919> as<WG5613> a sinner<WG268>?

And<WG2532> not<WG3361> rather, (as<WG2531> we be slanderously reported<WG987>, and<WG2532> as<WG2531> some<WG5100> affirm<WG5346> that we<WG2248> say<WG3004><WG3754>,) Let us do<WG4160> evil<WG2556>, that<WG2443> good<WG18> may come<WG2064>? whose<WG3739> damnation<WG2917> is<WG2076> just<WG1738>.

What<WG5101> then<WG3767>? are we better<WG4284> than they? No<WG3756>, in no wise<WG3843>: for<WG1063> we have before proved<WG4256> both<WG5037> Jews<WG2453> and<WG2532> Gentiles<WG1672>, that they are<WG1511> all<WG3956> under<WG5259> sin<WG266>;
As<WG2531> it is written<WG1125><WG3754>, There is<WG2076> none<WG3756> righteous<WG1342>, no, not<WG3761> one<WG1520>:
There is<WG2076> none<WG3756> that understandeth<WG4920>, there is<WG2076> none<WG3756> that seeketh after<WG1567> God<WG2316>.

They are<WG1578> all<WG3956> gone out of the way<WG1578>, they are<WG889> together<WG260> become unprofitable<WG889>; there is<WG2076> none<WG3756> that doeth<WG4160> good<WG5544>, no, not<WG3756> one<WG2076><WG2193><WG1520>.

Their<WG846> throat<WG2995> is an open<WG455> sepulchre<WG5028>; with their<WG846> tongues<WG1100> they have used deceit<WG1387>; the poison<WG2447> of asps<WG785> is under<WG5259> their<WG846> lips<WG5491>:
Whose<WG3739> mouth<WG4750> is full<WG1073> of cursing<WG685> and<WG2532> bitterness<WG4088>:
Their<WG846> feet<WG4228> are swift<WG3691> to shed<WG1632> blood<WG129>:
Destruction<WG4938> and<WG2532> misery<WG5004> are in<WG1722> their<WG846> ways<WG3598>:
And<WG2532> the way<WG3598> of peace<WG1515> have<WG1097> they not<WG3756> known<WG1097>:
There is<WG2076> no<WG3756> fear<WG5401> of God<WG2316> before<WG561> their<WG846> eyes<WG3788>.

Now<WG1161> we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> what things soever<WG3745> the law<WG3551> saith<WG3004>, it saith<WG2980> to them who are under<WG1722> the law<WG3551>: that<WG2443> every<WG3956> mouth<WG4750> may be stopped<WG5420>, and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the world<WG2889> may become<WG1096> guilty<WG5267> before God<WG2316>.

Therefore<WG1360> by<WG1537> the deeds<WG2041> of the law<WG3551> there shall<WG1344> no<WG3956><WG3756> flesh<WG4561> be justified<WG1344> in his<WG846> sight<WG1799>: for<WG1063> by<WG1223> the law<WG3551> is the knowledge<WG1922> of sin<WG266>.

But<WG1161> now<WG3570> the righteousness<WG1343> of God<WG2316> without<WG5565> the law<WG3551> is manifested<WG5319>, being witnessed<WG3140> by<WG5259> the law<WG3551> and<WG2532> the prophets<WG4396>;

Even<WG1161> the righteousness<WG1343> of God<WG2316> which is by<WG1223> faith<WG4102> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> unto<WG1519> all<WG3956> and<WG2532> upon<WG1909> all<WG3956> them that believe<WG4100>: for<WG1063> there is<WG2076> no<WG3756> difference<WG1293>:
For<WG1063> all<WG3956> have sinned<WG264>, and<WG2532> come short<WG5302> of the glory<WG1391> of God<WG2316>;
Being justified<WG1344> freely<WG1432> by his<WG846> grace<WG5485> through<WG1223> the redemption<WG629> that is in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424>:

Whom<WG3739> God<WG2316> hath set forth<WG4388> to be a propitiation<WG2435> through<WG1223> faith<WG4102> in<WG1722> his<WG846> blood<WG129>, to<WG1519> declare<WG1732> his<WG846> righteousness<WG1343> for<WG1223> the remission<WG3929> of sins<WG265> that are past<WG4266>, through<WG1722> the forbearance<WG463> of God<WG2316>;

To<WG4314> declare<WG1732>, I say, at<WG1722> this<WG3568> time<WG2540> his<WG846> righteousness<WG1343>: that<WG1519> he might be<WG1511> just<WG1342>, and<WG2532> the justifier<WG1344> of him<WG846> which believeth<WG4102> in<WG1537> Jesus<WG2424>.
Where<WG4226> is boasting<WG2746> then<WG3767>? It is excluded<WG1576>. By<WG1223> what<WG4169> law<WG3551>? of works<WG2041>? Nay<WG3780>: but<WG235> by<WG1223> the law<WG3551> of faith<WG4102>.
Therefore<WG3767> we conclude<WG3049> that a man<WG444> is justified<WG1344> by faith<WG4102> without<WG5565> the deeds<WG2041> of the law<WG3551>.
Is he<WG2228> the God<WG2316> of the Jews<WG2453> only<WG3440>? is he not<WG3780> also<WG1161><WG2532> of the Gentiles<WG1484>? Yes<WG3483>, of the Gentiles<WG1484> also<WG2532>:
Seeing<WG1897> it is one<WG1520> God<WG2316>, which<WG3739> shall justify<WG1344> the circumcision<WG4061> by<WG1537> faith<WG4102>, and<WG2532> uncircumcision<WG203> through<WG1223> faith<WG4102>.
Do we<WG2673> then<WG3767> make void<WG2673> the law<WG3551> through<WG1223> faith<WG4102>? God forbid<WG3361><WG1096>: yea<WG235>, we establish<WG2476> the law<WG3551>.
